text: Western Pluck is a 1926 American silent western film directed by Travers Vale and starring Art Acord, Marceline Day and Ray Ripley.Munden p.877 ==Cast== * Art Acord as 'Arizona' Allen * Marceline Day as Clare Dyer * Ray Ripley as Gale Collins * Robert Rose as 'Rowdy' Dyer * William Welsh as 'Dynamite' Dyer * Helen Cobb as Molly * S.E. Jennings as Buck Zaney * Charles Newton as Sheriff Wayne ==References== ==Bibliography== * Munden, Kenneth White. The American Film Institute Catalog of Motion Pictures Produced in the United States, Part 1. University of California Press, 1997. ==External links== * Category:1926 films Category:1926 Western (genre) films Category:American films Category:American Western (genre) films Category:American silent feature films Category:English-language films Category:Universal Pictures films Category:Films directed by Travers Vale Category:American black-and-white films
title: Western Pluck
